titr.Description: Boolean indicating whether trial was in the titration period or in the main experiment

surround.Description: Angle of surround grating relative to vertical (nan indicates grating-absent trials during titration)

centre.Description: Angle of centre grating relative to vertical

Levels.1: Left button was pressed, corresponding to a counterclockwise rotated centre.
Levels.2: Right button was pressed, corresponding to a clockwise rotated centre.
